text: Marcus D'Amico (4 December 1965 – 16 December 2020) was an German-born British actor. He was best known for his role as Michael "Mouse" Tolliver in the 1993 Tales of the City miniseries. He was born in Frankfurt, Germany. D'Amico died on 16 December 2020 at the age of 55.Marcus D’Amico, the original Mouse from Tales of The City, dies aged 55 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:People from Frankfurt
title: Marcus D'Amico
